channel.title: [pi] removing default quests from quest tab
channel.description:
Hey im just wondering how to remove the default quests from the quest tab in pi.
atm this is my code for quest tab
[code]public void process() { getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " ", 640); //quest journal title getPA().sendFrame126("Player Statistics", 663); //quest title getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@FROG Points", 7334); //quest title getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+frogPoints+" ", 7336); getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Current Slayer Task", 7383); //quest title getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(slayerTask)+" ", 7339); //quest title getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Amount Remaining", 7338); //quest title getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+taskAmount+" ", 7340); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Items Kept on Death", 7341); [/code]
however on top and below these are the normal runescape free and members quests.

item.title: [pi] removing default quests from quest tab
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

[quote=“PLayRooney, post:2, topic:383599”]Just add heaps getPA().sendFrame126("", ####);
Change the #### to the ID of the quests from the list you want to remove[/quote]

tyvm will give it a shot, also what id would i use to remove where it says Members quests :S

thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] removing default quests from quest tab

item.title: [pi] removing default quests from quest tab
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Hey im just wondering how to remove the default quests from the quest tab in pi.

atm this is my code for quest tab

[code]public void process() {
getPA().sendFrame126(“Players Online: “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " “, 640); //quest journal title
getPA().sendFrame126(“Player Statistics”, 663); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(”@gre@FROG Points”, 7334); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(” @yel@"+frogPoints+" “, 7336);
getPA().sendFrame126(”@gre@Current Slayer Task", 7383); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(slayerTask)+" “, 7339); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(”@gre@Amount Remaining", 7338); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+taskAmount+" ", 7340); //quest title

getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Items Kept on Death", 7341);
[/code]

however on top and below these are the normal runescape free and members quests.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] removing default quests from quest tab
